alert.note: Alert for Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 2:55PM EDT until August 04 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Oneida County in central New York... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 254 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Floyd, or 8 miles east of Rome, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rome, Trenton, Floyd, Steuben, Remsen, Holland Patent, Prospect, Barneveld, Barnveld and Hinckley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
